from_timestamp.description: Timestamp to retrieve candles since, in nanoseconds since the epoch, required field - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

to_timestamp.description: Timestamp to retrieve candles since, in nanoseconds since the epoch, required field - See [`VegaTimeResponse`](#api.VegaTimeResponse).`timestamp`

interval.description: Time interval for the candles, required field specified as a valid postgres interval

GetCandleDataRequest.title: Get Candle Data Request
GetCandleDataRequest.description: Request for a list of candles for a market at an interval

skip.description: Skip the number of records specified, default is 0

limit.description: Limit the number of returned records to the value specified, default is 50

descending.description: Descending reverses the order of the records returned, default is true, if false the results will be returned in ascending order
